import React from 'react' import "./Profile.css"; import ava from "./img/profile-0-Enhanced-Animated.gif" import tree from "./img/tree.gif" import {Route, Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Edit from "./EditProfile"; import { auth } from './firebase'; import {database} from "./Database/Firebase" function Account() { var name="Default" var email="Default" var age="Default" var level="Default" var treeid="Default" var avatar="Default" var uid="Default" var phone="Default" var profession="Default" const user = auth.currentUser; GetInfo(user.email); function GetInfo (usermail){ database.collection("User").get().then((querySnapshot) => { querySnapshot.forEach(element => { var data = element.data(); if (data.email == usermail){ name=data.name; email=data.email; age=data.age; level=data.level; treeid=data.treeid; avatar=data.avatar; uid= data.uid; phone=data.phone; profession=data.profession; } }); alert(age) }) } return (
